content: a set of 4 double pointed needles simply divide into 3 needles first needle 30 stitches second needle 15 stitches third needle 15 stitches when knitting the heel flap you have to join the stitches of the second and third knitting needles to one knitting needle cuff cast on 60 sts divide into 30 sts on circular needles join to work in the round being careful not to twist place marker to mark beg of round optional rnds 1-20 work in 1x1 ribbed alt k1 p1 leg rnds 1-20 work in stockinette stitch all knit sts at the end of the 20th round turn the work heel flap the heel flap is worked back and forth across the second 30 sts as follows row 1 wsr sl 1 p-wise p29 turn row 2 rsr sl 1 p-wise k1 14 times sl 1 p-wise p1 turn row 3-31 repeat row 1-2 heel turn start work from the wrong side row row 1 wsr sl 1 p-wise p19 p2tog turn row 2 rsr sl 1 p-wise sl 1 p-wise k1 5 times ssk turn row 3 wsr sl 1 p-wise p10 p2tog turn row 4-17 repeat row 2-3 © 2023 cozysocksstore all rights reserved row 12 heel sts gusset resume working in the round pick up and knit 18 sts along the side of the heel flap next k 30 sts across the front of your sock place marker optional pick up and knit 18 sts along the side of the heel flap 78 sts needles knit across the heel sts then k down the first set of new sts you picked up on the left side you ve reached the end of the round and all your sts have now been picked up decreases gusset round 1 work in knit across 30 sts sl marker k1 ssk k around to 3 sts before the end of round k2tog k1 round 2 work without decreases sts repeat these two rnds until you have 60 sts on your needles *note if you have an odd number of sts in the last decreases round simply do an extra decrease only from one side of the gusset it doesn t matter which side you do this extra decrease foot continue in stockinette stitch all knit sts until your foot reaches your desired length before beginning your toe decreases i begin shaping for the toes once my sock
